title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Roadworthiness
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Roadworthiness 

Testing) (National Contact Point) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (roadworthiness testing) (national contact point) regulation 2021

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 2. The Road Safety Authority is designated as the national contact point in
text_raw:
2. The Road Safety Authority is designated as the national contact point in 
the State responsible for exchanging information with the other Member States 
and the European Commission with regard to the application of Directive 
2014/45/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 3 April 20141. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 November, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ No. L 127, 29.4.2014, p. 51 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [621] 3

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Statutory Instrument designates the Road Safety Authority as the national 
contact point responsible for exchanging information with other Member States 
and the European Commission for the purposes of Article 15 of Directive 
2014/45/EU. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [621]
